sentences.en: ...a narrow cleft in the rocks too small for humans to enter.
sentences.cn: ...石块上一个对于人想钻进来说太小了的裂口。

sentences.en: A cleft chin is considered manly.
sentences.cn: 下巴上有沟痕的人被认为很有男子气概.

sentences.en: Cleft lip and cleft palate is a kind of common congenital malformation.
sentences.cn: 唇腭裂是临床上最常见的先天畸形之一.

sentences.en: Cleft lip and palate is one of the most common congenital malformation.
sentences.cn: 唇腭裂畸形是人类最常见的先天发育性缺陷之一.

sentences.en: Cleft palate is exterior the charge of repair operation how.
sentences.cn: 腭裂外部修复手术的费用如何.

sentences.en: He found himself in a cleft stick.
He was cleft from his brother during the war.
sentences.cn: 在战争期间,他与他的哥哥分离.

sentences.en: I hid the message in a cleft in the rock.
sentences.cn: 我把情报藏在石块的裂缝里.

sentences.en: I'm in a cleft stick because I can't sell my house.
sentences.cn: 因为屋子卖不出去,我的难题不能解决.

sentences.en: Objective To explore the experience of caring infants with cleft palate repair.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨唇腭裂修补术患儿的护理经验.

sentences.en: PURPOSE: To analyse the results of using Bioglass to repair alveolar cleft.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察人工骨修复材料-倍骼生治疗牙槽突裂的临床效果.

sentences.en: The climber fell down a cleft in the rocks.
sentences.cn: 爬山者跌入岩石的裂缝里。

sentences.en: The deep cleft . in his cheek he refused to call a dimple.
sentences.cn: 脸颊上露出他拒绝称作酒窝的深纹.

sentences.en: The ice cracked and he slumped into the cleft.
sentences.cn: 冰裂开,他(噗通)掉入裂缝中.

sentences.en: The man cleft a block of in two with an axe.
sentences.cn: 她一斧头把木块劈成两半.

phrases.phrase: be (或 be caught) in a cleft stick

trans.tran_en: If someone has a cleft chin, they have a cleft in their chin

trans.tran_cn: 裂缝，裂口，cleave的过去式和过去分词，进退维谷
trans.tran_en: a natural crack in something, especially the surface of rocks or the Earth

trans.tran_cn: 劈开，剁开，割开( cleave的过去式和过去分词 )
